value:
$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|I've looked everywhere in the
north tower, but I was unable
to find Edelgard.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|I see. It's likely she has already left
the castle then.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|Alfonse, is she...really Edelgard?$k$pHer appearance... I could not help
but see reminders of my past.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|It is Edelgard. We have the assurance
of $Nu.$k$pAnd if that's the case, there must
be something of the Edelgard we
know within her.$k$pEven if her appearance is quite
far from the Edelgard we know...$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_闇ディミトリ,ch17_03_Dimitri_M_Dark04,Face|$Fi1500|...So she's behind this commotion?$k$pNo matter the world you tread on,
you bring only calamity, Edelgard.$k$pOur proximity is rather convenient,
I must admit. I will end you before
you can bring harm on this world.$k$pHah...hahaha! Who between us will
rip the other's throat first? Who will
be the greatest monster?$k$pLet us fight to the death—and hold
nothing back! It is time!$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|$Fi1500|There's trouble! I have a report that
Dimitri just left the castle. He was
traveling alone.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Hm. Is he trying to follow Edelgard?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|I have heard their stories are closely
intertwined in their worlds...$k$pI'm fairly sure that Heroes are unable
to harm each other—but you can
never be totally certain.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|I will pursue them. Eir, will you
join me?$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|That was my intention.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Commander Anna, please wait here
for the others. Sharena will return
with $Nu soon.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Got it. Be careful out there.$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_闇マーク男,ch04_22_Marc_M_Dark04,Face|$Fi1500|They're on the move...$k$p$WmMPID_闇マーク女,ch04_24_Marc_F_Dark04,Face|Then we will advance our plans
as well.$k$p$WmMPID_闇マーク男,ch04_22_Marc_M_Dark04,Face|Heh heh... We must remember to
thank $Nu.$k$pI never imagined such a fascinating
world would be within our grasp.$k$p
